name: Phobos (itch) (MrPufix, ardelt, Ekatherina Monfald, solncesucht, WanderingCactus, Python_musk)
name_original: Phobos (itch) (MrPufix, ardelt, Ekatherina Monfald, solncesucht, WanderingCactus, Python_musk)
description:
Experience neverending cycle of stages becoming harder with each loop. Collect oil by defeating enemies before the ligth fades away or be consumed by the darkness. 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement; Space - Jump; LMB - Attack; Shift - Dash (also makes you immune).
